```
                                               +------------+
                                               |Global Scope|
                                               +------------+--------------------+
                                +------------+ |firstName                        |
                                |4.i to 4.iii| |lastName                         |
                                +------------+ |age                              |
                                               |displayPerson                    |
                                               |                                 |
          +------------+                       |        +-------------------+    |
          |Global Scope|                       |        |displayPerson Scope|    |
          +------------+--------+              |        +-------------------+-+  |
 +------+ |                     |              |        |fname                |  |
 |Start | |                     |              |        |lname                |  |
 +------+ |                     |              |        |prefix               |  |
          |                     |              |        |fullName             |  |
          |                     |              |        |getFullName          |  |
          |                     |              |        +---------------------+  |
          +---------------------+              +---------------------------------+
                                              +------------+
                                              |Global Scope|
                                              +------------+-------------------------------+
                                              |firstName                                   |
                              +-------------+ |lastName                                    |
                              |4.iii to 4.iv| |age                                         |
                              +-------------+ |displayPerson                               |
                                              |                                            |
          +------------+                      | +-------------------+                      |
          |Global Scope|                      | |displayPerson Scope|                      |
         ++------------+--------+             | +-------------------+-------------------+  |
+------+ |firstName             |             | |fname                                  |  |
|1 to 4| |lastName              |             | |lname                                  |  |
+------+ |age                   |             | |prefix                                 |  |
         |displayPerson         |             | |fullName      +------------------+     |  |
         |                      |             | |getFullName   |getFullName Scope |     |  |
         |                      |             | |              +------------------+-+   |  |
         |                      |             | |              |suffix              |   |  |
         |                      |             | |              |                    |   |  |
         +----------------------+             | |              +--------------------+   |  |
                                              | |                                       |  |
                                              | +---------------------------------------+  |
                                              |                                            |
                                              +--------------------------------------------+
```
